I like the way they fit and how they look on me.  They’re warmer on the walk from parking lot to gym on cold winter days than those tight leggings I was wearing to the gym but not too warm when working out. I also like how nicely they wash.  For reference I’m 5’3” and 135 lbs, and I got Medium in black. And considering navy. : )  Good value.
Light weight but fit well,not too long or too wide in the leg.

I like the soft material & it is comfortable.  Material is thinner than normal sweatpants so more for warmer weather.  I bought a small size. I am 5'2" & 107 lbs.  It is a little snug in the butt & I have a flat butt so it would be tight if you have a rounder butt.  They are definitely long & the left leg was 2 inches longer than the right leg!  Very strange. I washed in cold water & did a light dry in the dryer & they didn't shrink.  I would buy them again but would definitely return for another pair if the lengths don't match.
These pants were a gift requested by my daughter.  They are nicely made and the fit is great!  These are a go to brand and style for her!

I'm a professional dog walker and go through a lot of sweats. These fit great, and are really comfy. I wash nearly all clothing before wearing them. These were just fine in the wash. Great style and an excellent price!
Need to return, they run small. Why is this survey so hard to submit? I do not like the new version.

I really like the fabric, very middle weight. Pants have pockets which I like. I ordered Medium (usually wear size 4-6, 5'4" & 120 lbs) and they are kind of snug. I washed them and they didn't shrink so they work for me. Glad I didn't order my usual size. I also like that there's no elastic around the ankles.
Bought these for my mom as a gift first time I ordered size to big but really nice comfy pants she loves them and great price

评论概述: Run a bit small & a bit scratchy
评论详情: The heathered charcoal color is 50% poly/50% cotton, unlike the other colors, and I find the fabric a bit scratchy.  I'm currently a size 6 or 8 and medium fit basically just right, but for a drawstring pant I think they could be looser.  They're a fairly substantial weight and seem to do what I need in terms of being flexible enough to lounge around in at home but presentable enough to step outside, but the scratchy fabric makes them less comfortable than I'd like.

I ordered these pants after ordering a pair for my mother.  I liked them so much I decided to get them for me.  I tried them on as soon as they arrived but they were too small.  I quickly decided to exchange them for a larger size.  I should have been more observant when trying them on since I would have noticed that they were previously worn.  I didn't notice that until I was repacking them for the return.  I really hope that the new ones will be brand new or I will be returning them too.  And yes, I did go back and check the ones I ordered for my mother.  They are brand new.
These are so soft and comfortable. The fit is on point, and the value is great!

I've bought these pants for at least 10 years and wear them around the house and when I go out shopping - they are great wearing pants.  I do turn them wrong side out to wash since they are cotton and I've never had them to pill.  The color doesn't run, stays true and they look great straight out of the dryer.  Good price as well.
Came with the seams already coming apart and a hole right in the bottom. Highly disappointed.

I ordered two pairs of medium pants, black and blue. I am satisfied with the blue pair but the black pair shrank significantly even though it was washed in cold water. I ended up giving the black pair away. I usually like Hanes products.
The seams starting coming apart after owning them for about a month, wore them a few times a week around the house. Seams started unraveling after a few washes.
I bought an xl and xxlarge. The xl was 2 inches shorter than xxl. I got these for the length, I usually go for 32"inseam. These were neither comfortable or long enough. Very thin as well
Soft and comfortable

I’ve been an XL in every pant I’ve ever worn. I sized up to an xxl on these because some reviews said they run small and they do!  These fit like a snug xl.  They look really loose and comfy in all of the photos but they’re slightly fitted through the thighs and they’re also a little short.  They come well above my ankles and I’m only 5’8”, I’m not a giant.  Somehow they’re still comfy and I’m not going to bother returning them but they definitely run small.  Oh, also, they arrived with no tags. Like I have no idea if these have been worn before so I washed them — maybe that’s why they’re so short now. I didn’t try them on first.
I like these very much. Hope they hold up in the wash. Will buy again if they do. Fit is great.

评论概述: Like them very much, especially the pockets !
评论详情: I purchased a black pair size XL. They arrived very promptly and fit just right; I’m 5’7” XL 185lbs.  They are light weight, with a low pile fleece lining and (yeah) pockets that can actually hold things. Very happy I bought them, and have just purchased a second pair.

I bought medium sized Hanes sweats in navy, grey and black. The waistband sizing varies greatly - the black should have been labeled a small.  The leg length of the blue pair were different by just over an inch. The length across the three pairs was about the same. Because of the waist sizing issue, I wouldn't buy these again.
This came with one leg 2 inches longer than the other. I was able to fix it but shouldn't have had too. Poor quality.

评论概述: Like the color but tight in the waist.
评论详情: Color good waist too tight.

评论概述: 90% cotton knit pants. Comfy. Good value. Allow for some shrinkage.
评论详情: I wanted cotton knit pants general wear and these, in black, are 90% cotton, the closest I could get. They do shrink in length and width in the  first washing/drying, so you might want to order up a size.  Those colors  with a higher proportion of synthetic fiber probably shrink a bit less.
Comfortable

These are perfect fit, soft, warm and comfortable to wear.  They look nice so they are one of the few pair of sweats I will wear out for errands and doctor appointments.  Also comfortable for lounging.
These are a good fit and the pant legs have a good length and not too short.  Light weight and comfortable.

评论概述: Not if you don’t want mid rise
评论详情: These fit pretty good except mid rise is horrible for me. Sitting/squating leads to a lot of adjustments for this type of fit. Other than that, they’re flattering and mid-weight for year-round comfort. Unfortunately I have to send them back.
These were a little too big but after washing and drying they fit better, which means they do shrink some.  They are light weight and provide a little warmth.
I absolutely love them they fit great and are comfortable
Perfect for lounging or working out
Had to return it as it is too long. Would buy Short version if available.
These are your basic gray sweatpants, good for just kicking it around the house.  The material is not too heavy, but thick enough to wear in winter.  Good price.
Fits great. I like the flat waist band.

The pants fit well and look great. The feel of the material is soft. Haven’t washed them yet to see if they shrink but doubt they will. You will enjoy wearing these pants and feel good while doing so,

评论概述: Very nice material which is hard to find these days
评论详情: The size is perfect, the length perfect (I'm 5'7 and there's some gather at the bottom which I love).  Very soft, comfortable and warm.  I ended up getting 3 of them.  Wish they had maybe purple or red or even orange for Halloween :)
They are super comfortable, not wrinkled or baggy coming out of the dryer, look nice enough to go out to dinner, etc...

When I got these pants I loved them. Really like the French terry fabric. They fit really well and are comfortable. When I washed them the first time they had some fur in the. However, when I washed them the second time they came out of the dryer coated in fur. Sooo much fur the black pants look grey. I’ve never had ANYTHING that collected fur like this. I’m not sure if I will keep them.
Every time I order from Amazon, I order a new pair of these pants. I love the fit and comfort.
Angry I have to bother to return these , what a waste of my precious time, looks like C

评论详情: The black ones do not fit the same as the light gray ones i bought.  The cut and fabrick are different.  Disappointed.  Will keep, but won't order more of that color.

I am 5'2 and these fit perfect after washing, very comfortable, love the wide ban. Should be listed as Irregular as the seam down one leg is off and runs down the front side. :/ Okay for around the house but wouldn't wear anyplace else.

Item described as "french terry" but is not at all terry cloth. These things are as light as wearing jersey material as pants. I doubt in any way that this will be durable for anyone with thighs that touch.
Good length and weight
They appear to be of quality material and workmanship. They fit well and appear to be comfortable. She is in a wheelchair so, don’t ask me anymore questions.
For a cooler day, these French terry sweats are warm.  I wear a size 10/Medium and these fit true-to-size.  Be aware that they are a mid-rise fit, sitting just below the belly button.
Comfortable, texture

These arrived today. Perfect for our mild GA winters. I laundered them and there was NO shrinkage. The inseam was 31" before laundering and 31" after coming out of dryer. I'm happy. Will buy another couple of pairs. 👍
Great fit andcquality
Just what I was looking for,so comfortable, true to size.I bought 3 colors.great for shopping,walking or lazing around in.absolutly LOVE them.also bought the capris too!!
These are very comfy and easy to pull on. The weight is substantial (not flimsy). I would highly recommend this product
Not spandex or like sweat pants there's are comfy and fit nice. Not super warm, but you won't sweat in them!
I can wear a small size but the waist is very low on me and thus they are low in the draw.  Will send back and either get medium or another style.

I’m a little over 5’2 and 200lbs (mostly in booty/thigh) and the XL fits perfectly especially the length! The material is btwn regular sweats and yoga pants (not leggings) so not too thick or thin. One star shy of 5 due to texture being slightly rough but I washed and used softener and it’s better. Didn’t shrink! I can wear to grocery store and home. Just ordered another pair!

I wear a size 8 and ordered a medium. They are true to fit. I love the fact that they are 90% cotton, which is softer on my skin. They did not shrink much after I washed them and they are now a go-to when I need to slip on something really comfortable when in a hurry. I also like that they are a straight-leg pant versus yoga pants, which are really wide at the bottom.
The rise on the pair I received is very short. Returns are bothersome, so I’ll keep them and just make sure I wear a longer shirt to avoid “plumber’s crack.”

I've ordered five pairs of pants all the same size. They've all fit me great. I had no questions that these pants should fit. These pants are not cut true to size and unless you are planning for a flood. They have a waist line that is twice as big as the size of the legs. Terrible product
Pants kept stretching out ridiculously to the point that they looked like my husbands pants
Item as described, prompt shipping
They fit well.
Comfy but run big. Order a size down !
Super comfy. Love having pockets
They fit perfectly and all the stitching is good. These gray ones are a bit rougher feeling than the black ones I got a few years ago not uncomfortable though.

评论概述: Not like the others I bought years ago
评论详情: I’ve bought these Hanes XXL sweatpants before and had a great experience. In the past, they’ve held their size, no shrinkage issues, and they fit true to size with no surprises. Unfortunately, this recent purchase has been disappointing. When I first tried them on, they fit perfectly, but after washing, it’s like they shrank a full size! Now they ride up to my ankles, giving me the “flood pants” look, and that’s not what I signed up for. They do stretch back with a few wears, but the length doesn’t recover, which is frustrating. Not the reliable fit I was expecting, and it's a bit disappointing to lose out on the comfort and length.

I bought the charcoal in a medium. They fit great until I washed and dried them. They shrunk and are very tight now.  I'm going to return for a larger size. Other than that, they are a nice pair of pants.
Amazon directed me to size large and they are that.  They run LARGE.  I reordered medium and I may come back and change this review.
Disliked the fact this one pair was used!
Love these! I have one in black also.  May want to consider getting one size up since they are cotton and shrink a little.  Very comfortable and just the right warmth for winter.  Quality product.

评论概述: The description is accurate! They are so comfortable and the fit is perfect
评论详情: They fit great after washing! I ordered a small (I really need an xs) but these shrunk up just enough for me to be ok with the fit! They are well made, with lighter weight cotton.  I like the wider legs and not having elastic at the bottom of the leg.  I highly recommend them, especially for the price!!
The fit is perfect.  However, I was expecting a thicker material.  Great for lounging though!

I love these Hanes lightweight sweat pants.  I ordered black, navy and light gray which I love, very soft annd comfortable.  I also ordered charcoal and found them to be very itchy. I realized the charcoal Heather are 50 cotton and 50 polyester. The others are 90 cotton and 10 polyester.  I’m sure that’s why the charcoal are itchy and not as soft. I’m going to wash them inside out to see if it softens the lining. I hope so as I want them to be just as soft and cozy as the others.
I love these. Wish they came in more colors. They do shrink and fade, i sized up. The dark grey was also thinner and not as nice as the black pair, nor as soft. But for the price i love them
Pantalon cómodo me gusta mucho

Purchased three (3) pair of Champion pants and two (2) Hanes (the Hanes were less expensive).  Tried them all on upon their arrival and Champion fix perfect and the Hanes,  way too small.  Clicked on the "return" Hanes product and downloaded the QR code.  Returned to an Amazon Fresh.  Now being charged for "not returning" the Hanes product (double checked and I have not one pair of Hanes pants and only the Champion from that order.  NOW they are recharging me indicating I sent back the wrong ones which I did not.  Be aware this company.

They shrunk after washing, bummer. Material is comfortable other than that.

The color (charcoal) is nice, the stitching and construction appears to be good, but I haven't worn them yet and don't know how they will hold up after wearing and washing a few times.  These fit more like leggings than sweat pants. I'm 5'6"" and 120 lbs. Purchased a small. The fabric is awfully thin for "french terry".
Great pants

I am 5’6.5” 147 Lbs. My recommended size is medium. I could barely get them on my thighs. Also, the fabric was irritating. I am looking for a fabric for sensitive skin. This is not that. On a positive note, the length is good.
Love this brand, love the weight of the material, my only complaint is the length varies considerably after washing. Wish they made a longer length than 31in size xl to allow for shrinkage.
I lounge around my house in them.  Comfy.  Easy to launder.
I usually wear a large but pants were too small. Ordered an XL--too small. The XXL fit although they are too short.
